ListOpinions - stream opinions of a user

chart.title: chart - Chart (that has a small title, axes titles and data)

insight.title:
insight - Insight (a small piece of text that provides some insight into a
topic, e.g. "40% of millenials spend more than 3hours on social media
daily")

audience.description:
audience - Audience (which is a series of characteristics, for that
exercise lets focus on gender (Male, Female), birth country, age groups,
hours spent daily on social media, number of purchases last month) e.g.
Males from 24-35 that spent more than 3 hours on social media daily.

get.summary: List - stream favourites of a user
List - stream opinins of a user
ListFavourites - stream favourites of a user
ListOpinions - stream opinions of a user

protobufNullValue.description:
`NullValue` is a singleton enumeration to represent the null value for the
`Value` type union.

The JSON representation for `NullValue` is JSON `null`.

 - NULL_VALUE: Null value.

countryCode.title: country_code - iso 2 birth country code (auto lowercase)

countryCodes.title: country_codes - [](0-300 elements, unique, code max_len 2) optional

hoursMin.title: hours_min - hours on social (1-24) hours spent daily on social media

hoursMax.title: hours_max - hours on social (1-24) hours spent daily on social media

purchasesMin.title: purchases_min - (1-100_000) number of purchases last month

purchasesMax.title: purchases_max - (1-100_000) number of purchases last month
